Jim, Tom -

Maybe this suggestion is a little risky, but if the writing is on a flat
surface, perhaps the careful use of a single-edged razor blade used at a low
angle to the surface (so as not to scratch or "catch") would simply "pop
off" the ink. Again, care must be taken so as not to scratch the surface
patina.

Ron
